total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the color changes in the examples.
Q2: Determine the rules for changing the color of the cells from 8 to another color.
Q3: Apply the rules identified in Q2 to the input grid of the quiz.
Q4: Identify the cells that need to be changed based on the rules identified in Q2.
Q5: Change the color of the cells identified in Q4 according to the rules identified in Q2.

Q3: Identify the color that each shape is changing to.
Q4: Identify if there is a specific order to the color changes.
Q5: Apply the identified pattern of color changes to the input grid of the quiz.

Q7: Apply the color changes to the entire grid to generate the output grid.
